items.question: What should consultants wear?
items.answer: Business professional works best - blazers, suits, or polished casual depending on your firm's culture. Solid colors photograph well.

items.question: Can consultants submit from client sites?
items.answer: Yes. Consultants can submit their selfie from anywhere - client offices, airports, hotels, or home. Just good lighting and a plain background.

items.question: How do we ensure consistency across offices?
items.answer: Set team-wide style preferences once. Every consultant's headshot will match your brand guidelines automatically.

items.question: Can we use these in client proposals?
items.answer: Absolutely. Our headshots are high-resolution and perfect for proposals, pitch decks, and printed materials.

items.question: Do you offer enterprise pricing?
